meanings.definition: A person or thing that is single or individual.

meanings.definition: A design pattern that restricts the instantiation of a class to one object.
meanings.sent1: The software developer implemented the singletons pattern to ensure only one instance of the class existed.
meanings.sent2: Using the singletons design pattern helped maintain consistency in the application.
